  • Pre-process complex financial data and create ETL pipelines to support machine learning models.
  • Continuously improve our machine learning workflows, research, and deployment pipelines, ensuring best practices and innovation.
  • Collaborate closely with team members and cross-functional teams, utilizing strong communication skills to develop robust machine learning solutions.
  • Take ownership of subcomponents of the machine learning infrastructure, ensuring their performance and scalability as the platform evolves.

That's What You Bring Along

  • 5 + years of experience working with the whole data science product cycle: conception, research, prototyping, modelling, deployment to production
  • Master’s degree in STEM field
  • Very good engineering skills in Python and familiarity with clean code (pre-commit, black, code reviews etc.), unit testing (pytest) and type hints (mypy).
  • General understanding of SQL and SQL databases. Ability to retrieve data and build data pipelines that feed models in research and (ideally) build pipelines for production.
  • Advanced knowledge of statistical learning theory and its application to solve real-world problems.
  • Strong stakeholder communication skills with the ability to clearly present ideas, solutions and findings.

Nice To Have

  • MLOps and experience on AWS Cloud
  • Experience in Fintech

Equal Opportunities & Diversity

We value our diversity and welcome everyone to our team. Regardless of ethnic and social background, religious views, worldview, gender, sexual orientation, physical and mental limitations, age, marital status, educational background and nationality. With over 250 employees and 40 different nationalities, we take our values seriously. These include; ownership, growth, integrity, collaboration, customer centricity and inclusion (4/6 of our C-Level Board members are female).

About Us

We dare to design the future of payments. Ratepay is energy and diversity and: custom-made state-of-the-art payment solutions. Established in 2009 we were a fintech before the word fintech even existed. Today we are the number one white-label Buy Now Pay Later payments provider in Europe handling over 2.5M transactions per month and we’re constantly growing.

We are where we are because we work together as one team. Because we got the freedom to execute ideas. And above everything: because we never stop improving. Here it is all about shared goals not about the big ego. We are dedicated pros (more than 250 of them) not cons. We embrace being courageous, committed and decisive, warm-hearted and having a will to win.

We have our origin in the heart of the payment scene and cover the whole value chain from integration support to the dunning process with a core of AI-based risk management. With us, you can integrate direct debit, instalments and prepayment. In other words: the favourite payment methods in Germany, Austria and Switzerland (the Dutch like it too). Located in the middle of Europe’s fintech metropolis (Berlin) we are proud to work with major partners such as Eurowings, Ebay and About You and hundreds more.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (MRI)
Description:
Position Overview:

We are seeking a Senior MRI Scientist with expertise in Machine Learning to drive innovation in MRI data acquisition, analysis, and interpretation. This role involves developing machine learning models to enhance MRI performance, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and improving diagnostic outcomes.




Key Responsibilities:

Lead the development of machine learning models for MRI image reconstruction, denoising, and artifact reduction.
Apply AI for MRI data analysis (e.g., segmentation, classification, quantitative imaging).
Collaborate with clinical researchers and engineers to integrate AI into MRI workflows.
Design novel MRI techniques to accelerate scanning and improve image quality.
Stay current with advancements in machine learning and MRI; contribute to publications and conferences.




Qualifications:

PhD in Biomedical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
3+ years of experience in MRI research; 3+ years in machine learning applications.
Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, or PyTorch; experience in medical image processing.
Strong background in MRI physics and image reconstruction.
Proven track record of scientific publications and experience with clinical applications.
You have strong coding skills in Python and C/C++
You have experience with MR pulse sequence development and imaging optimization




Preferred:

Experience with 3D medical imaging, high-performance computing, and GPU-based training.
Familiarity with FDA regulations and MRI hardware.




Benefits:

Comprehensive salary
Long term incentives
25+ days holiday
Clear development pathway




If you are interested in this role then be sure to contact Aimee Greatorex, a specialist AI Recruiter who will discuss the opportunity with you in detail. She will be more than happy to answer any questions relating to the industry and the potential for your career growth.




The conversation can also progress further to discussing other opportunities, which are also available right now or will be imminently becoming available. This position has been highly popular, and it is likely that it will close prematurely. We recommend applying as soon as possible to avoid disappointment.

Title: Head of Data Science
Description:
Are you passionate about the intersection of AI and Blockchain technology?

Are you interested in developing best-in-class data science & engineering teams?

Are you a Data Science/ ML leader with both hands-on and strategic leadership expertise?




They are an established technology leader leveraging blockchain technology to provide financial ease/freedom for their customers.




As a head of department you'll take ownership of their new blockchain initiative, providing expert insights into the productionization of their state-of-art AI-enabled web3 product, driving innovation & optimizing their existing product suite.




Responsibilities

Recruit & Lead a team of of Data Scientists, Engineers, etc in the development of their AI-enabled products
Work in tandem with their cross functional stakeholders (provide data-driven insights)
Directly work on product architectural design, experimentation & validation, ensuring feasibility
Stakeholder management - explaining complex designs/concepts, etc.
Develop exciting large scale web2 & web3 products (structured/unstructured data sets)
Productionizing cutting-edge DL projects from concept to creation (0-1)
Keeping on top of technical developments in their area & using such to optimize their existing ML models

Requirements

Computer Science, AI/ML, Mathematics or related degrees
8+ years of industry experience ideally in a leadership role
3/4+ years of leadership experience (minimum)
Expertise productionizing crucial consumer products that leverage AI, ML, NLP & Data Science
Experience deploying production grade DL models (PyTorch, AWS, GCP or Azure)
Experience with MLOps; AirFlow, MLFlow, Wandb or similar
Experience within the crypto/web3 industry (added bonus)
Experience Founding/ Developing a team (added bonus)
